channel.title: ]SRL Varrock Guard Killer L33cher
channel.description:
[code] [CENTER]SRL Varrock Guard Killer L33cher[/CENTER] [/code]
[center][SIZE=1]The Beginning...[/SIZE][/center]
[B] This is the leecher version. It lacks several antiban things including a wicked scribble etc. If you wish to exp the full version then contribute and become an SRL membe[/B]r :)
[code]
//****************************************************************************// // * Scar Resource Library Vr. 1.1+ // * // * NAME : Royal Varrock Castle Guard Killer vr 1.2 // * WRITER : SDcit (with MAJOR help from WTF // * CATEGORY : Fighting // * DESCRIPTION : Kills Guards in Varrok Castle // * USAGE : Start at Lumbridge Castle SZquare. // * AUTOCOLOR : //-----------------------------------------------------------------------====]} [/code]
This script will walk from lumbridge to Varrock, kill guards till death, then walk back. Has latest antiban including Bens scribble. Walks back after death.
[B] This is the leecher version. It lacks several antiban things including a wicked scribble etc. If you wish to exp the full version then contribute and become an SRL membe[/B]r :)
[----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------]
[B][SIZE=5]Instructions.[/SIZE][/B]
[-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------] 1. Use ScruneRape Client Low Detail. 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. 3. Position your Players at Lumbridge Castle as close to
[IMG]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/5143/there4gv.png[/img]
as possible and postition player in center
4. Have GUi set to true the FIRST time you ever use PlayerForm
5. Set up
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Features.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - SRL Based. - DeathWalk:cool: - Auto Handling Randoms. - Cool newbox method by taking of cloths and dieing.
- Nice antiban not in leecher version
-
_
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Credits:
Wt fakawi - Gave me 3/4 of the walking procedure
Neonknight- test
Benland - Thanks for your wootzer scribble. not in l33cher version
Note: If you are a person whos procedure/ function i used, feel free to tell me to take it off.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Known Issues.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - Still waiting on Reports -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- General Notice: -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Use this script at your own risk. I'm NOT responsible for any Ban or Loss you might encounter using this script.
[B]READ THE INSTRUCTIONS IN THE SCRIPT[/B]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Progress Reports : -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

item.title: ]SRL Varrock Guard Killer L33cher
item.dc:creator: @sdcit sdcit
item.description:
@sdcit wrote:

no. Become an SRL member its an “award” as you might say[br][size=1]Posted at: May 05, 2006, 03:34:41 pm[/size][hr]updated, for somereason i cant update my last post and i cant attach… il post it

//****************************************************************************//
// *                  Scar Resource Library  Vr. 1.1+
// *
// *              NAME        : Royal Varrock Castle Guard Killer vr 1.2
// *              WRITER      : SDcit (with MAJOR help from WTF
// *              CATEGORY    : Fighting
// *              DESCRIPTION : Kills Guards in Varrok Castle
// *              USAGE       : Start at Lumbridge Castle SZquare.
// *              AUTOCOLOR   :
// *              NOTES       :
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------


{   ________  _______     _______      ___       ___  ___   _______
   |        ||   ____|   /       |    /        |   /   | |   ____|
   |   (----`|  |__     |   (----`   /  ^      |    /  | |  |__
           |   __|              /  /_     |  |/|  | |   __|
.----)   |   |  |____.----)   |    /  _____    |  |  |  | |  |____
|_______/    |_______|_______/    /__/     \__ |__|  |__| |_______|


  01010011   01000101 01010011     01000001        01001101 01000101

  [         Sdcit's Enterprise of Scripts And Many Eateries         ]




{IMPORTANT!!!!        IMPORTANT!!!                  IMPORTANT!!!

                  Get road color after you have met one loading
                  screen cause the color changes

                  Set GUI to true once and set up players
}

{[===========================================================================]
|Thanks for using a[n] SESAME production script, the "Royal" Varrock Castle |
|Guard Killer. The script took me a whole lot of time to get right,         |
|especially the walking part (Thank God for WT-Fakawi). Please enjoy        |
|this script.                                                               |
| To use:                                                                   |
|                                                                           |
|       ---> Setup lines 147 to 155  .                                             |
|                                                                           |
|       ---> Stand in Lumbridge castle and position yourself as close       |
|            as you can get to the pic i posted.                            |
|                                                                           |
|       ---> Have 3 pieces of armour/weapons equiped. No food.              |
|                                                                           |
|       ---> SET THE ROAD COLOR. Well, not really, but if you don't         |
|            it won't work 99.9% of the time.                               |
|                                                                           |
|       ---> Watch the script the first time, just to make sure it works    |
|                                                                           |
|                                                                           |
|       ---> Have SRL included right FFS!                                   |
|                                                                           |
|       ---> Suggestions i will take :)                                     |
|                                                                           |
|         Have fun                                                          |
[===========================================================================]}

{Credits:
  WtFakawi, Lig0r, Neonknight77, Flyboy, and some other people that
  i learned from. Couldn't have done it without you guys :).
  
  WT-Fakawi- Lent me his walker :)

Testers: Neonknight, Canofpeople, lig0r.

Additional notes:

SRL is maintained by the SRL crew.
Recommended equip is a sword, plate and legs
[Legal stuff]
You may not in anyway reproduce, sell, or lend this script to any person,
place, or thing less with my permission. i am not responsible for
loses or gains.
[/Legal stuff]


[Contact Info]
SRL Forums- Pm

Email- Sdciter@gmail.com
                         }










{==========================================================================================}













program RoyalVarrokCastleGuardKiller;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/Fighting.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Misc/PlayerForm.Scar}




{Setup}
const
  Roads       =   7040116;  //Road color
  Trips       =   1      ;  // How many times to fight guards and die.
  Style       =   1      ;  // Style of fighting. Numbered from top to bottom
  Timer       =   20000  ;  // Maximum amount of time before clicking next
                            // Guard.
  StartPlayer =   0      ;  // Which player to start at.
  Gui         =  true    ;  // Use it once at true, then set to false
  

{Setup end}

Const
  Vrr         =  '1.2'   ;






{========================VAR======================================}
var
  Rosh, Died, Killed: Integer;
  Swit, Swit2                        : Boolean;
  


{++++========Dont touch below PLEASE unless a scritper========++++}


{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}


{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}

procedure SwapPlays(Reason:String; State:Boolean); // Little thingy
begin
  Writeln('Switched because of '+ Reason);
  Nextplayer(State);
end;

{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}


procedure RandomTab;
var  ac, at:Integer;
begin
 ac:=1+random(50)
     if(ac<=7)then
     begin
          GameTab(ac);
          case ac of
            1: SetFightMode(1+random(3))
            2: hoverskill('random');
            4: UseItem(2+random(27))
          end;
          wait(3000+random(2000));
          at:= 1+random(8);
          GameTab(at);
          wait(3000+random(2000));
     end;
end;


{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}

procedure Mo;
begin
  getClientDimensions(x, y);
  MMouse(Random(x), Random(y), 2, 2);
end;


procedure EquipItems;
var
  ABCD:Integer;
begin
  for ABCD:= 1 to 3 do
    MouseItem(ABCD, true)
end;

{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}


{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}

procedure RightRandClick;
var
  PColor, TColor, RColor: Integer;
  begin
    case Random(5) of               // Random PlayerColor
      0: PColor:= 7708622;
      1: PColor:= 6786229;
      2: PColor:= 6983609;
      3: PColor:= 7774416;
      4: PColor:= 4221833;
    end;
    case Random(3) of                 // Random Plant Color
      0: TColor:= 1251352;
      1: TColor:= 2056280;
      2: TColor:= 3362888;
    end;
    RColor:= 6184806;                 // Road color
    begin
      case random(10) of
        3: begin
             if (FindMainColor(x, y, PColor, 80, false)) then
               begin
                 Mouse(x, y, 2, 2, false);
                 wait(1000+Random(200));
               end;
           end;
        5: begin
             if (FindMainColor(x, y, TColor, 80, false)) then
               begin
                 Mouse(x, y, 2, 2, false);
                 wait(1000+Random(200));
               end;
           end;
        8: begin
             if (FindMainColor(x, y, RColor, 80, false)) then
               begin
                 Mouse(x, y, 2, 2, false);
                 wait(1000+Random(200));
               end;
           end;
      end;
    end;
  end;
  
  

{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}


procedure R;
begin
  case Random(10) of
    1: RandomTab;
    2: Mo;
    4: RightRandClick;
  end;
end;

{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}


procedure R2;
begin
  case Random(10) of
    1: RandomTab;
    2: Mo;
    5: RightRandClick;
  end;
end;



{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}




procedure WalkToBlackWizards;// by fakawi (<3 <3 <3 ,<3) edited by me
begin
  RadialWalk(Rosh,90,0,65,-1,1);
  wait(1)
  R;
  FindnormalRandoms;
  RadialWalk(Rosh,90,0,65,-1,1);
  wait(1)
  R;
  FindnormalRandoms;
  RadialWalk(Rosh,0,90,65,0,1);
  MarkTime(Mark);
  repeat
    RadialWalk(Rosh,420,250,35,0,1);
    FindnormalRandoms;
  until( (FindSymbol(x, y, 'cook')) or (TimeFromMark(Mark)>600000) );
end;

{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}

procedure WalktoCastle;  // walks to varrock castle
begin
  repeat
    LinearWalk(Rosh, 0, 72, -1, 1);
    FindNormalRandoms
  until(Findsymbol(x, y, 'water'))
  Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc := 'Varrock Castle';
  Mouse(x, y, 1, 1, true)
end;


{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}
procedure Sttack(Color1, color2, color3, color4, color5, color6, color7:Integer; Name:String; Tolerance, Tij:Integer);// Made by fakawi, edited by me a bit.
var
  Bx, GColor: Integer;
begin
  for Bx := 1 to 7 do
  begin
   case Bx of
    1: GColor:= Color1;
    2: GColor:= Color2;
    3: GColor:= Color3;
    4: GColor:= Color4;
    5: GColor:= Color5;
    6: GColor:= Color6;
    7: GColor:= Color7;
  end;

  if (not( Loggedin)) then break;
  begin
     if (GColor=0) then break;
     if (FindObj(x, y, 'ttack '+Name, GColor, tolerance)) then
     begin
        GetMousePos(x, y);
        if(not (Loggedin) or (WeAreDead)) then break;
        Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, True);
        if(not (Loggedin) or (WeAreDead)) then break;
        wait(2000);
        FFlag(10);
        RandomTab;
        MarkTime(Mark);
        repeat
           if(not (Loggedin) or (WeAreDead)) then break;
           wait(1000+Random(500));
           if (TimeFromMark(Mark)>Tij) then break;
        until ( (not (FindColorSpiral(x,y,GreenStatusColor,240,140,290,175)) or (WeAreDead) ));
        Killed:=Killed+1
     end
     else
     begin
       writeln('restart in different world')
       TerminateScript;
     end;
   end
 end
end;



{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}



procedure TrainGuards;// kills gaurds?
begin
  SetFightMode(Style);
  Reincarnate:=false; // Very important
  Sttack(1055884, 1328218, 1516323, 1317916, 857879, 2902883, 4605773, 'Guard', 20, timer);
end;

procedure Boxtime;
begin
  Gametab(4);
    if (FindNewBox) then
      begin
        begin
          for x:= 0 to 11 do
            TakeOff(x);
        end;
        Retaliate(false);
        repeat
          Sttack(1055884, 1328218, 1516323, 1317916, 857879, 2902883, 4605773, 'Guard', 20, 999999999999999999999);
        until (Wearedead)
        wait(200+random(100));
        for x:=1 to 3 do
          MouseItem(x, true);
      end;
end;


{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}



{*******************************************************************************
procedure FindNorRandoms;
by: The SRL-Team!... all time sexiness by Mutant
Description: Calls the 'normal' random checks.
*******************************************************************************}
procedure FindNorRandoms;   // Edited to my use
var
  i : Integer;
begin
 for i:=1 to 15 do
  begin
  case I of
   1:  CloseWindow;
   2:  FindSandwich;
   3:  FindLamp(LampSkill);
   4:  FindMod
   5:  FindMime;
   6:  FindMaze;
   7:  Findquiz;
   8:  FindFrog;
   9:  FindDemon;
   10: FindScapeRune;
   11: BoxTime;
   12: FindTrade;
   13: begin
        if(not(Loggedin))then
           Exit;
       end;
   14: begin
        if(NoGameTab)then
         begin
           Players[CurrentPlayer].loc := 'No GameTab';
           Logout;
          Exit;
         end;
       end;
   15: R;
  end;
  wait(1);
 end;
end;


{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}


procedure ProgressReport;
var
  Hours, Minutes, Seconds: Integer;
  Time:String;
begin
  ClearDebug;
  Hours:= ScriptTime(1);
  Minutes:= ScriptTime(2);
  Seconds:= ScriptTime(3);
  Time:= inttostr(Hours)+ ' Hours, ' +inttostr(Minutes)+ ' Minutes, and ' +inttostr(Seconds)+ ' Seconds.';
  WriteLn('[-----------------------------------------------]');
  WriteLn('Script ran for '+Time                             );
  Writeln('Player:=       '+Players[CurrentPlayer].Name      );
  WriteLn('Made '+inttostr(died)+' time[s]'                  );
  WriteLn('Killed '+inttostr(killed)+' guard[s]'             );
  WriteLn(' Thanks for using a SESAME script.   '            );
  writeLn('  __   __                            '            );
  Writeln(' /   |/  |      / /                  '            );
  Writeln('(___ |   | ___   (___                '            );
  Writeln('  )  |   )|    | |                   '            );
  Writeln('__/  |__/ |__  | |__                 '            );
  WriteLn('[-----------------------------------------------]');
end;


{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}










procedure Loop;  //Well... does everything
begin
{Sets up}
  SetupSRL;
  BenMouse:= true;
  Reincarnate:=true;
  if (Gui) then
    begin
      SetupPlayers;
    end else
    LoadUS;
  CurrentPlayer:=StartPlayer;
  if (not (Loggedin)) then
    LoginPlayer;
  repeat
    Killed:=0
    SetChat('off', 1);
    SetChat('off', 2);
    SetChat('off', 3);
    SetChat('off', 1); // makes sure
    NickNameBMP:=CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick,UpChars);
    Died:=0;
    Swit:=false;
    Swit2:=false;
    PerfectNorth;
    Rosh:= Roads;
{/Sets up}

     repeat //Does the killing
{Walks}
      if (Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc = 'Lumbridge') then
        begin
          WalkToBlackWizards; //Fakwi
          FindNormalRandoms;
          WalktoCastle;// my little thingy
        end;
{/walks}



{The guards are being lazy, this is unacceptable, go teach them a lesson}
      if (Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc = 'Varrock Castle') then
        begin
          repeat
            AddtoReport('Killing guards')
            TrainGuards;
            R2;
            FindnorRandoms;
            if wearedead then begin Died:= Died+1; Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc:='Lumbridge'; break; EquipItems end;
            if (Died = Trips) then begin Swit:=true; break; end;
            if (not (loggedin)) then begin Swit2:=true; Break;end;
          until (false)
        end;
{/The guards are being lazy, this is unacceptable, go teach them a lesson}

    until Swit or Swit2;

{Switch?}
    begin
      if (Swit2) then
        SwapPlays('For a random reason your out',False);
        ProgressReport;
      if (Swit) then
        ProgressReport;
        SwapPlays(Players[currentplayer].name+' is done with '+inttostr(Trips)+' trips', true);
   end;
   if (not (Loggedin)) then  NextPlayer(False);  // Always the last line!
  until false

{/Switch?}
end;

{--------------------------------------------------------------------------}
      
begin
  ChangeReportWidth(0)
  Loop;
end.



{If autocolor works for you pm me... i will congradulate you... never
 worked for me...}

Read full topic

//****************************************************************************//
// *                  Scar Resource Library  Vr. 1.1+

// *              WRITER      : SDcit (with MAJOR help from WTF
// *              CATEGORY    : Fighting
// *              DESCRIPTION : Kills Guards in Varrok Castle
// *              USAGE       : Start at Lumbridge Castle SZquare.
// *              AUTOCOLOR   : 
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------====]}

This script will walk from lumbridge to Varrock, kill guards till death, then walk back.
Has latest antiban including Bens scribble. Walks back after death.


This is the leecher version. It lacks several antiban things including a wicked scribble etc. If you wish to exp the full version then contribute and become an SRL member

[----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------]

[SIZE=5]Instructions.[/SIZE]

[-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------]

  1. Use ScruneRape Client Low Detail.
  2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color.
  3. Position your Players at Lumbridge Castle as close to

as possible and postition player in center

  1. Have GUi set to true the FIRST time you ever use PlayerForm

  2. Set up

Features.

  • SRL Based.

  • DeathWalk:cool:

  • Auto Handling Randoms.

  • Cool newbox method by taking of cloths and dieing.

  • Nice antiban not in leecher version

_
